column1: #Text=Or maybe Hillary simply didn't have a very good campaign, had the wrong advisers, and, like all candidates, had certain flaws that her opponents went after?
#Text=I was struck by the fact she frequently reminded people ('I'm with Her') that SHE was running for President.
#Text=How often did Barack Obama remind people in 2008 that HE was BLACK?
#Text=The people who were going to vote for her 'because she was a woman' didn't needed to be reminded.
#Text=And for the rest of the population?
#Text=It probably didn't matter for most of them.
#Text=And her final rallies with Hollywood and music stars?
#Text=I wonder if these didn't do more harm than good in those 'Fly Over' places where most people felt forgotten?
